metadata.description: Personal marketplace for developing and sharing custom Claude skills

plugins.name: sync-personal-skills
plugins.description: Synchronizes skills from this marketplace repository to ~/.claude/skills/ for global availability across all projects. Also commits and pushes changes to GitHub.

plugins.name: hostinger-ssh
plugins.description: SSH connection and server management for Hostinger VPS srv759970 (automation@69.62.108.82)

plugins.name: hostinger-docker
plugins.description: Docker container management on Hostinger VPS - optimize images, deploy services, troubleshoot errors

plugins.name: hostinger-nginx
plugins.description: Nginx reverse proxy and SSL management on Hostinger VPS srv759970

plugins.name: hostinger-database
plugins.description: Manage shared database instances (PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB) on Hostinger VPS

plugins.name: hostinger-maintenance
plugins.description: Recurring maintenance tasks and runbooks for Hostinger VPS - cleanup, monitoring, health checks

plugins.name: hostinger-space-reclaim
plugins.description: Reclaim disk space on Hostinger VPS (srv759970) through automated analysis and cleanup of Docker images, volumes, logs, and application data. Use when disk space is critical (>90% usage) or for regular maintenance to prevent space issues.

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use when building web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

plugins.name: pdf
plugins.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms. Use when processing, generating, or analyzing PDF documents.

plugins.name: xlsx
plugins.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization. Use when working with Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx, .xlsm, .csv, .tsv).

plugins.name: docx
plugins.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction. Use when working with Word documents (.docx files).

plugins.name: pptx
plugins.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis with support for layouts, speaker notes, and comments. Use when working with PowerPoint presentations (.pptx files).

plugins.name: mcp-builder
plugins.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers to integrate external APIs and services with Claude. Use when building MCP servers in Python (FastMCP) or TypeScript.

plugins.name: webapp-testing
plugins.description: Toolkit for testing local web applications using Playwright. Supports verifying frontend functionality, debugging UI behavior, capturing screenshots, and viewing browser logs.

plugins.name: canvas-design
plugins.description: Design beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf formats using advanced design philosophies. Create posters, infographics, and publication-ready designs.

plugins.name: web-artifacts-builder
plugins.description: Build interactive web artifacts quickly. Create prototypes, demos, and web-based tools with streamlined workflows for rapid development.

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Official Anthropic guide for creating effective Claude skills. Step-by-step workflow including bundled resources, progressive disclosure, and quality assessment rubric.

plugins.name: skill-creator-pro
plugins.description: Enhanced skill-creator with comprehensive Skill Chaining documentation. Includes standardized Input/Output specs, visual workflows (ASCII), bidirectional skill relationships, and Git hooks integration. Use for creating skills that are part of larger workflows.

plugins.name: skill-reviewer
plugins.description: Auto-évaluation et amélioration itérative des skills Claude. Reviews skills against 9-dimension quality rubric, detects DRY violations, enforces progressive disclosure, and provides automated refactoring suggestions. Use when you need to review, score, and improve existing skills for production quality.
